resources.string: New Pho Saigon & Noodle Grill Restaurant

We're OPEN LATE!
Sun - Thurs 8:30am - 2am
Fri & Sat 8:30am - 3am.
"We serve the freshest Rice Noodle Soup daily"
Our menu includes: Beef, Chicken, Seafood Noodle Soup, Beef Stew Noodle Soup, Grilled Pork Chop Over Rice, Grilled Pork, Marinated Shrimp, Eggroll Vermicelli Bowl, Spring Rolls, Vietnamese Eggrolls.
